messages.title: Backing Leadership and Stability
messages.content: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making a success of BREXIT for Nottingham - control of our own borders, laws, and money.
Ensuring every child in Nottingham has access to a great education and the opportunity to succeed.
Securing a strong economy to ensure decent local jobs are available for local people.

issues.brexitEurope: Making a success of BREXIT for Nottingham - control of our own borders, laws, and money.
issues.economy: Securing a strong economy to ensure decent local jobs are available for local people.
issues.education: Ensuring every child in Nottingham has access to a great education and the opportunity to succeed.

endorsements.endorsement: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else. Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.
